paper.title: A Relational Model for Non-Deterministic Programs and Predicate Transformers

author.org: IMAG, Grenoble (France) and the New University of Lisbon

paper.venue: Proceedings of the Fourth 'Colloque International sur la Programmation' on International Symposium on Programming
paper.abstract: A relational model for non-deterministic programs is presented. Several predicate transformers are introduced and it is shown that one of them satisfies all the healthiness criteria indicated by Dijkstra for a useful total correctness predicate transformer.
